pages.title: File Structure
pages.description: Refactor your project into different files.

tasks.description: create a folder in your base directory called "pokemon" and add a file inside called "index.js"
take your `VOTE_UP` action type from "index.js" and put it in "pokemon/index.js"
take your `voteUp` action creator from "index.js" and put it in "pokemon/index.js". Export it as a ["named" export](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/web/javascript/reference/statements/export).
hints: "pokemon/index.js" should have `const voteUp = id => ({ type: VOTE_UP, payload: { id } });`

tasks.description: take your `pokemon` reducer from "index.js" and put it in "pokemon/index.js". Export the reducer as a "default" export
in your "index.js" file, import the action creators and reducer in one line of code.
hints: Try this: `import { default as pokemon, voteUp } from './pokemon';`
